testcase.name: Test users by Name---
testcase.system-out: * url 'https://gorest.co.in' .............................................. passed * header Authorization = 'Bearer vymTXK9cDHiVxwVgdRcPn3UoDreZ5a-x5ZgR' .... passed Given path '/public-api/users' ............................................ passed And param first_name = 'john' ............................................. passed When method get ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And def UserResponse = response ........................................... passed And def name = 'Deepak' ................................................... passed Then match UserResponse.result[*].first_name contains ["Johnnie"] ......... passed
